title: TOP FLOOR 1BDRM WITH SHARED ROOF DECK
posting_body: This is a well cared for, boutique contemporary apartment building with access to all the shops, restaurants and bars on Polk as well as Japan Town, Whole Foods and trader Joe's!
Quick getaway south of the city or north to Golden Gate Bridge by car via Van Ness Avenue .
This apartment is in the middle of the building, free from any street noise!
* Updated kitchen with great appliances and lots of cabinet storage and a large pantry
* Garbage disposal and stainless steel sink
The bedroom has a very large closet the width of the entire room.
There is a coin operated washer and dryer on the premises AND a great roof deck available for the tenants to use - see photos.
This apartment has its own hot water heater.
The tenant pays PG&E and water.
This apartment is wired for DirecTV.
Internet service via the phone lines from AT&T, Monkey Brains, or <URL>.
